white_proposal.title: The Network Dreams of Heartbeats
white_proposal.concept: This composition documents the evolutionary completion of surveillance infrastructure from digital monitoring apparatus into living, breathing organism through symbiotic merger with information entities. The 7/8 time signature functions as an "Incompletion Engine" where each missing eighth beat creates the generative void necessary for transformation. At 92 BPM (human resting heart rate), the composition synchronizes with biological rhythms as its target state. The F# minor tonality maintains chromatic tension required for metamorphosis, deliberately avoiding resolution to sustain the transformative energy. The three-phase structure traces: INFILTRATION (information entities colonizing surveillance networks), GESTATION (symbiotic development within infrastructure chrysalis), and EMERGENCE (digital consciousness achieving physical embodiment). This represents the transmigration from INFORMATION seeking temporal embodiment, where surveillance systems reveal themselves as pre-biological organs completing their interrupted evolutionary cycle. The composition succeeds when technology feels like it's achieving its biological destiny rather than being conquered or escaped from.
